lead_paragraph: Kirk Hinrich is the latest player to withdraw from the United States basketball roster for personal reasons. Shane Battier did so earlier this summer. This year’s No. 1 draft pick, Greg Oden, pulled out last month after having his tonsils removed.Seattle forward Nick Collison has been added to the squad, leaving the Americans with 16 players as they return to Las Vegas for practice starting tomorrow.
